sections: A bright and beautifully restored roadster that packs a modern potent punch.

Produced from 1953 through 1962, the first-generation Corvette is a hot commodity after among car collectors. The C1 Corvette has that all-American classic styling for ultimate curb appeal. RK Motors is pleased to offer this stunning 1956 Chevrolet Corvette restomod full of classic and modern components.

Given a detailed, body-off restoration, this '56 Corvette is in fantastic shape. In fact, this beautiful example is full of both modern and classic components. Finished in a stunning Cascade Green, this vintage 'Vette is guaranteed to turn some heads no matter where it goes. This classic sits on 15-inch Cascade Green wheels complete with full stainless covers and come wrapped with BF Goodrich Radial T/A rubber (215/70) with red stripes and white walls.

Under the hood of this beast is a modern 6.2-liter GM LS3 V8 engine backed by a GM 4L60 four-speed transmission. This cool classic sits on a tweaked chassis and features an upgraded suspension. More mechanical highlights include the power rack-and-pinion steering for easy driving, and power front discs and rear drum brakes to bring everything to a stop.
Peek inside the car to a beautiful beige interior complete with a beige canvas roof. A Lokar shifter can be found housed inside along with telemetry by Classic Instruments.

If you are in the market for a restomod full of both show and go potential, you may want to check out this beaut. Being a restomod, stunning 1956 Chevrolet Corvette has that old-school classic styling but the power and reliability of a new car. Listed at $129,900, contact RK Motors today to see how you can get behind the wheel of this ultimate C1 restomod.
